Ciphers

OPENSSL_CIPHER_RC2_40 (integer)
OPENSSL_CIPHER_RC2_128 (integer)
OPENSSL_CIPHER_RC2_64 (integer)
OPENSSL_CIPHER_DES (integer)
OPENSSL_CIPHER_3DES (integer)

Note: These constants were added in 4.3.0.
